backend/main.mo: Main backend canister implementing access control, blob storage mixin, and numerous user fitness tracking types and models.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report placeholder with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for various frontend files, describing their roles in the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React frontend with favicon assets and main script.
frontend/ops/publish-draft-50-to-live.md: Runbook detailing steps to promote Draft Version 50 of the frontend to production.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling authentication, profile setup routing, and dashboard rendering.
frontend/src/components/BurnedCalorieTra: UI component for adding, editing, and displaying burned calorie entries with validation and dialogs.
frontend/src/components/CalorieTracker.t: UI component for calorie intake tracking with add/edit functionality and optional compact chart view.
Weekly exercise planner allowing users to add, delete, and manage categorized exercises for each day with backend syncing.
Displays today's exercises, tracks completion, supports deleting items, and calculates streaks from daily checklists.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header showing app title, user greeting, profile edit button, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/MeasurementsTrac: Manages body measurement entries, including adding, editing, validating, and displaying historical measurements.
frontend/src/components/MotivationCard.t: Fetches and displays the daily motivational quote with loading state handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileEditDialo: Modal dialog allowing users to update profile details and motivational preferences, synced to backend.
frontend/src/components/ProgressPhotoGal: Placeholder component announcing upcoming progress photo upload and gallery feature.
frontend/src/components/ProgressView.tsx: Displays progress metrics including weight, calories, streaks, and exercise completion using data fetched from backend hooks and rendered in charts.
frontend/src/components/WeightTracker.ts: Manages adding, editing, and charting weight records with form dialogs and progress stats.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user data through the backend actor with error parsing and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/generate-favicons.ts: Generates and downloads themed heart-shaped favicon images using canvas.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the main dashboard with tabbed views for tracking weight, calories, exercise, photos, and progress, using user profile data and logout handling.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Displays a styled login screen that triggers Internet Identity authentication and highlights app features.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSetup.tsx: Provides a form for creating and saving a user profile including name, email, and motivational preferences.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Describes project state, decisions, and requirements focused on regenerating and integrating a new favicon set.
